definition: lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out

surname Guo
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out

sentences.english: Stranded wonderful spread tongue, is like a song you dance the last empress dowager.
sentences.chinese: 舌間擱淺的妙蔓，是想爲你舞一曲最後傾國傾城。

sentences.english: Stranded wonderful spread between the tongue, is like a song you dance the last empress dowager.
sentences.chinese: 舌間擱淺的妙蔓，是想爲你舞一曲最後傾國傾城。

sentences.english: His wife is an unmatched beauty.
sentences.chinese: 他妻子是一個傾國傾城的美人。

definition: to be unable to withstand a single blow/to collapse at the first blow
